name: Advatix OMS Sync
author: Rajat Bhatia

sections.description:
Advatix OMS Sync is used for synchronization woocommerce store with Advatix OMS.

It sync your woocommerce products, inventory.
It sync your woocommerce orders and manage order statuses.
It will create new order statuses.

THIRD PARTY INFO

This plugin uses Advatix.net developer services which helps integrate your woocommerce products and orders to sync in multi-directional.
After generating your API credentials from developer.advatix.net, it starts synchronization of products and orders into your woocommerce store and from your woocommerce store to Advatix OMS(Order Management System).
Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended
sections.faq:
How can I use the plugin?

For using and configuration of plugin you must go to main plugin page and generate the API keys from the link provided in the form. After you get your credentials from the third party then only you will be able to use the plugin.
